nodes.bodyText: Why did you add mustache-client here? I think the rest of the dependencies look correct but about this one I don't know. It doesn't appear in the list of jars that are shaded in when I run mvn clean install -DskipTests -Dfast. In the ES7 SQL connector module.

nodes.bodyText:
